channel.title: Teleport waiting -Delta
channel.description: DELTA- When I click on a teleport it automaticcaly sends me to the coords, how can I make a timer to wait? [tt] public int teleTimer = 0;[/tt] or something & how?

@xknightpk wrote:

Yes, but how can I code my own timer called timer? Like timer = 500 then you must wait around 500 milliseconds.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport waiting -Delta
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Because you have it as
toX = Blah;
toY = Blah;

Something like that.

I have this public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - magetimer > 500) { magetimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); resetWalkingQueue(); PlayerSoundEffect(202, 0, 10); } else if(wildyLevel >= 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) && !isinsafewild()){ sendText("You cannot teleport past level 20 Wilderness."); return; }

When you make a command or a teleport make it like this:

if(command.startsWith(“lumby”)) {
triggerTele(3222+misc.random(3), 3218+misc.random(3), 0); - This is the line of code that teleports you
PlayerSoundEffect(202, 0, 10); - If your source has sounds
}

Read full topic
